nane.salli walata upadhiya gaththu ayatane.uda aya kiyana widihatama ada pahema wela thiyenawa.anith upadhi wala.ayi rajaye ayata pahema awasthawak nolabennen.aththatama p upadhi wala awashy karana adanguwa na.paudgalika anshaye p adanguwa diyunu karala thiyenawa.paudgalika anshaye kawuda uganwanane.pitaratin genallada?na.rajaye wishwa widyadala wala aacharyawarama thamayi.pahenami ayi rajaye gunathmaka bhawaya adu une.hethuwa thamayi,wishaya nirdesha kappaduwa,wishaya nirdesha aluth nokirima,aacharya higaya,bhauthika samipath higaya(deshana shala,malti midiya upakarana,pusthakala pahasukami,)wage dewal.p hinda thamayi kamipas wala un igena ganna paka paththakin thiyala udgoshana karanne .(pka waraddakda?)awuti unama rassawa naththami pka laba ganda satan karana paka waraddak nami,satan kirima waraddak nami mulu ithihasayama waradathi,manda mulu ithihasayama ayithawasikami wenuwen ithawa sadharana ayithiwasikami wenuwen ,jiwath wimata awashyaa awama ayithiwasikami wenuwen satan kala heyini...........
